title: Basilica of Saint Paul Outside the Walls
summary: The Papal Basilica of Saint Paul Outside the Walls  (Italian: Basilica Papale di San Paolo fuori le Mura), commonly known as Saint Paul's Outside the Walls, is one of Rome's four ancient, papal, major basilicas,[lower-alpha 1] along with the basilicas of Saint John in the Lateran, Saint Peter's, and Saint Mary Major.
